name: debatesynergy
description: DebateSynergy.com web app enables high school and college debate teams to store online research and stream debate rounds.

scripts.setup: npm install forever -g && sudo setcap cap_net_bind_service=+ep `readlink -f \`which node\`` && mv node_modules/mongo-express/config.default.js config.mongo.js
scripts.min: cd public/js && minify -o ../min/ds.js alerts.js controlsettings.js docopen.js filetree.js navigation.js roundaction.js roundpanel.js sockets.js timer.js controlbuttons.js docedit.js filetreedrag.js init.js offline.js roundflow.js search.js  worddocx.js
scripts.min2: cd public/css && cat filetree.css roundpanel.css sidebar.css timer.css icon/debate-icons.css docstyle.css flow.css select2.min.css theme_elements.css uiSkylight.css | cleancss -o ../min/ds.css
